title: Citi Czech Republic Launches Alumni Network
summary: Prague - Citibank Czech Republic has joined its affiliates in more than 100 countries around the world to launch a Citi Alumni online network for former employees in the Czech Republic. The purpose of the Citi Alumni network is to give Citibank's former employees an opportunity to keep in touch with the bank and also their former colleagues. The www.citialumninetwork.com global website has a common global basis but each country has its own section that has been localized in their respective languages. Former employees ('alumni') can register and follow developments at the bank as they happen, and also enjoy some of the benefits to which Citibank's current employees have access.
tag-1: Citi Czech Republic Launches Alumni Network
tag-2: Prague – Citibank Czech Republic has joined its affiliates in more than 100 countries around the world to launch a Citi Alumni online network for former employees in the Czech Republic. The purpose of the Citi Alumni network is to give Citibank's former employees an opportunity to keep in touch with the bank and also their former colleagues. The www.citialumninetwork.com global website has a common global basis but each country has its own section that has been localized in their respective languages. Former employees ('alumni') can register and follow developments at the bank as they happen, and also enjoy some of the benefits to which Citibank's current employees have access.
tag-3: "With its almost 300,000 employees around the world, Citi has enormous potential for networking," comments Michal Nebeský, Citi Country Officer for the Czech Republic, on the Citi Alumni scheme, adding: "My own experience tells me that I often benefitted from keeping in touch with and promoting professional and personal relationships with my former Citibank colleagues when I was working for a different company. I can therefore personally recommend joining the Citi Alumni platform to all of the former employees who had and still have a positive relationship to Citibank."
tag-4: The Citi Alumni network is intended for all former employees who spent at least two years with Citibank, regardless of whether they worked full-time or part–time or whether the two years covered a continuous period of time. The Citi Alumni network gives Citibank's former employees an opportunity to resume contact with people they have worked in the past, but may have lost contact with after leaving Citibank. Through Citi Alumni, they can get in touch with their former colleagues and share with them their new experiences.
tag-5: Users registered with the Citi Alumni network will gain access to Citibank's special offers and bespoke products. They can also make use of discounts on visits to museums or popular sports events in various parts of the world. As part of the network, former employees will also have access to Citi's continuously updated surveys and through its newsletter they will be notified in advance of events organized by Citibank in their region and others. The Citi Alumni network also offers the opportunity to attend philanthropic and other non-profit events together with Citibank's employees.
tag-6: "For Citibank, the Citi Alumni network is also a tool for keeping and forging ties with the talented individuals who have left Citi but not ruled out returning to the bank in the future," adds Michal Nebeský who is a great example. After a few years spent outside of the bank, the returned to Citi as CCO for the Czech Republic.
